name: Stop and Error
semantic_context: Throw an error in the workflow
natural_language_description: 这是 Stop and Error 节点。主要用于: Throw an error in the workflow

errorType.name: errorType
errorType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Error Type | 作用: Type of error to throw | 默认值: errorMessage

errorMessage.name: errorMessage
errorMessage.natural_language_description: 参数名: Error Message | (必填项)

errorObject.name: errorObject
errorObject.natural_language_description: 参数名: Error Object | 作用: Object containing error properties | (必填项)
